Multinomial Distribution

mult_dist.Rd

Multinomial Distribution

mult_dist(x, pd, chi2.sort = FALSE)

Arguments

x

integer vector
pd

numeric vector
chi2.sort

boolean

Value

data frame of probability distribution

Examples

observed <- c(5, 3, 0, 0)
probabilities <- c(0.25, 0.25, 0.25, 0.25)
mult_dist(observed, probabilities)
